snippet: Another blot has been added to an already ugly record of anti-immigrant hatred and violence in Suffolk County on Long Island.
abstract: Editorial holds incident in which Suffolk County police officer robbed a dozen Latino men on Long Island during traffic stops is only the latest blot on county's ugly record of anti-immigrant hatred and violence; notes county's agreement to enact policies on training and accountability to increase outreach to Latinos seems to have had little effect.
lead_paragraph: Another blot has been added to an already ugly record of anti-immigrant hatred and violence in Suffolk County on Long Island.
